rules.name: Hypertension Alert
rules.description: Alerts if CDSS indicates high blood pressure and nurse input mentions 'headache' or 'chest pain'.
rules.generated_alert: Elevated blood pressure. Assess for symptoms of hypertensive crisis and administer antihypertensives as ordered.

rules.name: Tachycardia Alert
rules.description: Alerts if CDSS indicates high heart rate and nurse input mentions 'palpitations' or 'anxiety'.
rules.generated_alert: Increased heart rate. Investigate underlying causes (e.g., pain, anxiety, dehydration) and intervene accordingly.

rules.name: Hypoxia Alert
rules.description: Alerts if CDSS indicates low oxygen saturation and nurse input mentions 'dyspnea' or 'cyanosis'.
rules.generated_alert: Hypoxia detected. Administer oxygen, elevate head of bed, and notify physician.
